# 2.91

## A

```text
0x  4    0    4    9    0    F    D    B
=   0100 0000 0100 1001 0000 1111 1101 1011
e= 0b100 0000 0 = 2^7, E = e - 127 = 1
          f =0b100 1001 0000 1111 1101 1011
       M = 0b1.100 1001 0000 1111 1101 1011
所以， 0x40490FDB =
           0b11.00 1001 0000 1111 1101 1011
```

## B

```text
22/7 = 0b11.001 001 001 001 ...
```

## C

```text
   0b11.0010010000111111011011
   0b11.001001001001...
since 0.000000001 2^-9 bit，开始不同的
```
